mapinfo.detailsText:
The Great Basin is an area of alternating ranges and valleys. 
 Resource amount varies greatly depending on the altitude. 
 Make sure to control the trade route and the native posts to gain a long term strategic advantage. 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Klamath / Navajo 
 -Outlaws: Comanchero / Renegado 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
